about.title: About Us
about.description: La Dolce Vita is a family business, founded by Roberto Polimeno. His passion is to bring a smile to people's faces - with every bite. Roberto uses only natural ingredients from the region.
about.tradition: The dough mixture is freshly prepared daily and each crêpe is prepared right in front of your eyes - with love, craftsmanship and a recipe that has been passed down in his family for over 80 years. The recipe comes from Cursi, a small town in Puglia, in southern Italy - famous for its traditional crêpe art.
